Investor_7_pre_3.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7_pre_3.content: Throughout the investment process, I exhibited a strong commitment to a collaborative and fair partnership with my trustee, actively engaging in discussions and aligning my investment goals with the allocation plan provided by Sergey. My approach underscored my reliability and responsibility in resource management. Following a successful outcome from the investment, I believe my reputation has been bolstered as a discerning and trustworthy investor who prioritizes both returns and trust.
